snippet.title: Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side Opening
snippet.description:
This is the opening sequence for a Playstation 2 Dating Simulation Game called "Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side."

Released in 2002, Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side was the first of the Tokimemo series to be directed toward a female audience. In the game, female players make their way through three years of high school, while trying to attract a male character from a pool of dateable characters. The game play, while similar to other Tokimemo games, was slightly modified. The player is able to go shopping for clothes and accessories to wear on dates as well as buy chocolates for Valentine's Day. If the player is successful at wooing a male character by the end of the third year, then she will receive a confession of love at the Habataki Church along with that character's special ending.

Music:
"SIGNAL" by B'z

For Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side images, music, and more, visit our website at http://www.tokimekimedia.net

Follow us on Twitter!
http://www.twitter.com/tokimekimedia

DISCLAIMER: We do NOT own the content of this video. It is property of Konami.
